Step.SQLStatement: ALTER TABLE M_Production ADD COLUMN DocumentNo character varying(30); ALTER TABLE M_Production ALTER COLUMN DocumentNo SET DEFAULT NULL::character varying;
Step.RollbackStatement: ALTER TABLE M_Production DROP COLUMN DocumentNo;

Step.SQLStatement: ALTER TABLE M_Production ADD COLUMN M_Product_ID numeric(10,0); ALTER TABLE M_Production ALTER COLUMN M_Product_ID SET DEFAULT NULL::numeric;
Step.RollbackStatement: ALTER TABLE M_Production DROP COLUMN M_Product_ID;

Step.SQLStatement: ALTER TABLE M_Production ADD COLUMN M_Locator_ID numeric(10,0); ALTER TABLE M_Production ALTER COLUMN M_Locator_ID SET DEFAULT NULL::numeric;
Step.RollbackStatement: ALTER TABLE M_Production DROP COLUMN M_Locator_ID;
